tips.clay:
Clay Soil Advice:
• Crops: Rice, Lettuce, Broccoli.
• Issues: Poor drainage. Add organic compost.
• Watering: Water less frequently but deeply.
tips.red:
Red Soil Advice:
• Crops: Cotton, Pulses, Millets.
• Issues: Low nutrients. Add nitrogen and phosphorus fertilizers.
• Watering: Requires regular irrigation.
tips.black:
Black Soil (Regur) Advice:
• Crops: Cotton, Sugarcane, Wheat.
• Issues: Cracks when dry. Mulch to retain moisture.
• Watering: High water retention, avoid over-watering.
tips.sandy:
Sandy Soil Advice:
• Crops: Melons, Coconuts, Cactus.
• Issues: Low water retention. Add manure/peat moss.
• Watering: Frequent light watering needed.
tips.loam:
Loamy Soil Advice:
• Crops: Wheat, Sugarcane, Cotton.
• Issues: Ideal soil. Simply maintain organic matter.
• Watering: Standard irrigation.

General Soil Tip:
Always test your soil pH before planting. Add organic compost to improve soil structure regardless of type.
